players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I investigated Diana last night and discovered she is the mafioso. We should vote for her."
Diana: "I didn't kill Charlie! Bob is probably the mafioso trying to frame me to shift suspicion."
Bob: "Diana is the mafioso based on my investigation. We must vote her out to protect the town."
Diana: "Diana is clearly the mafioso based on Bob's investigation. We need to vote her out now to save the town."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
